attributes.action: Allow pubs and hospitality to reopen at all tier levels during the tier system
attributes.additional_details: The Government should allow the pub and hospitality sector to reopen at all tier levels and operate within a safe and covid secure environment. How’s it safe for 10,000 people to attend a shopping centre all indoors but 30 people aren’t able to sit in a covid secure area within a pub. Both sectors at a combined total is valued at £95bn, Britain is close to losing its tradition with the pub, the government must act now and allow the industry to reopen in a safe environment to safe jobs
attributes.background: Since pubs and the hospitality trade reopened back in the summer, all facilities were asked to adopt covid rules and regulations to ensure a safe environment is created for individuals which use the pubs.
